alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 8:41AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ONONDAGA...SOUTHERN ONEIDA...CORTLAND...SOUTHERN CAYUGA...SENECA...AND MADISON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 839 AM EDT, a band of snow was along a line extending from Sherrill to near Lehigh Vallley Junction and moving southeast at 25 MPH. A quick inch of snow may occur with this band leading to slick and hazardous roads. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Onondaga, Syracuse, Auburn, De Witt, Sullivan, Oneida, Lenox, Pompey, Seneca Falls, and Solvay. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 near 41. New York Interstate 81 between 13 and 18. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida
